data.title: Full Utility B Site Execute Stun
data.description: Combo your utility like so, in order to successfully shut down Defenders playing on the B Site. Your Aftershock will prevent Defenders at Elbow from helping their teammates on site.

data.title: Full Utility A Site Execute + Stun U-Hall
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to successfully shut down Defenders playing in U-Hall. This flash will blind Defenders playing back site, it will not blind your teammates scaling the site.

data.title: A Site Post Plant Aftershock + Flashpoint
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to disrupt Defenders from retaking the site successfully. You can peek out of U-Hall with just the Aftershock and fight Defenders dropping from Heaven without the flash.
